My Childhood, my first fps. Nostalgia so profound, ambivalent feelings of both Joy and Sorrow arises. It reminds me of the days I used to play with my friend in China on a potato pc destroying them mf bots like a boss - Now that I can experience it again, it is indeed a  blissful dream we are all living in.
